channel.description: Recent content in other on fuzhy blog

item.title: Blog Setup
item.description: 简要记录本博客的搭建流程和步骤。 前提 hugo git github 具体步骤 github创建公开的repo: blog hugo设置 hugo new site blog cd blog git init # theme git submodule add https://github.com/xianmin/hugo-theme-jane.git themes/jane cp -r themes/jane/exampleSite/content ./ cp themes/jane/exampleSite/config.toml ./

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is the first blog for hello world.
